description.value: Your body was modified to network seamlessly with other tech creatures. You gain shortwave, allowing you to communicate wirelessly with any creatures within 30 feet, as long as they have shortwave or are a construct with the tech trait. This doesn't give any special access to their thoughts or programming and communicates no more information than normal speech would. You can attempt Computers checks to Hack systems, @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Combat Hack], create a @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Digital Diversion], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Disable a Device], or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Pick a Lock] without a hacker's toolkit or free hand at a range of 30 feet.
